last_episode_to_air.name: The Series That Changed the World
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hilarious highlights from series 28, the series that changed the world.

name: Never Mind the Buzzcocks
overview: Never Mind the Buzzcocks is a comedy panel game show with a pop and rock music theme. The show is infamous for its dry, sarcastic humour and scathing, provocative attacks on the pop industry.

episodes.name: Matthew Priest, Bruce Dickinson, Richard Fairbrass, Donna McPhail
episodes.overview: The first of a new six-part comedy pop-quiz series. Mark Lamarr poses the questions for teams captained by comedians Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus. Tonight's panellists are Matthew Priest of Dodgy, former Iron Maiden lead singer Bruce Dickinson and Right Said Fred's Richard Fairbrass, while the guest comedian is Donna McPhail.

episodes.name: Shovell, Ashley Slater, Cathy Dennis, Graham Norton
episodes.overview: Mark Lamarr hosts the comedy pop-quiz series, with captains Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus, and guests Shovell from M People, Ashley Slater from Freak Power, Cathy Dennis and Graham Norton.

episodes.name: Martin Chambers, Andy McCluskey, David McAlmont, Bob Mortimer
episodes.overview: Mark Lamarr poses the questions for teams captained by comedians Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus in the pop-quiz series. Panellists are Martin Chambers from the Pretenders, OMD's Andy McCluskey, and singer David McAlmont. With guest comedian Bob Mortimer.

episodes.name: Billy Bragg, Sarah Cracknell, Suggs, Jeff Green
episodes.overview: The pop quiz hosted by Mark Lamarr with teams captained by comedians Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus. The panellists are singer and guitarist Billy Bragg, ex-St Etienne singer Sarah Cracknell and former Madness star Suggs. With guest comedian Jeff Green.

episodes.name: Nick Heyward, Marcella Detroit, Martin Rossiter, Jonathan Ross
episodes.overview: Mark Lamarr poses the questions for teams captained by comedians Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus in the pop-quiz series. The guest panellists are solo stars Nick Heyward and Marcella Detroit.

episodes.name: Jake Burns, Bob Mills, Richie Wermerling, Tony Wright
episodes.overview: Mark Lamarr introduces the pop quiz, with teams captained by comedians Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus. Executive producer Peter Fincham

episodes.name: Peter Hook, Ace, Clare Grogan, Alan Davies
episodes.overview: Joining the regular team for this week's comic pop quiz are New Order bassist Peter Hook, Skunk Anansie's Ace, former Altered Images vocalist Clare Grogan and comic Alan Davies. See today's choices. Director Steve Bendelack; Producer Jim Pullin

episodes.name: Adam Ant, Crispin Hunt, Jo Whiley, John Thomson
episodes.overview: Joining the regular team for the comic pop quiz are eighties singer Adam Ant , Longpigs lead singer Crispin Hunt, Radio One disc jockey Jo Whiley and comedian John Thomson.

episodes.name: Glenn Tilbrook, Neil Hannon, Lauren Laverne, Mark Thomas
episodes.overview: Mark Lamarr introduces the pop quiz, with teams captained by comedians Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus. Guests include singer and lead guitarist Glenn Tilbrook of Squeeze, Neil Hannon of the Divine Comedy, lead singer Lauren Laverne from the band Kenickie and comedian Mark Thomas.

episodes.name: The Best Bits of Series 1
episodes.overview: A compilation of the best moments from the first series, with chairman  Mark Lamarr and captains Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus.

Christmas Special 1998
episodes.overview: Host Mark Lamarr and team captains Phill Jupitus and Sean Hughes are joined for a special festive edition of the quiz show by Mel C of chart-topping girl band the Spice Girls, Natalie Appleton of female pop quartet All Saints, Huey of hip-hop and funk trio the Fun Lovin' Criminals and singer Rick Wakeman.

episodes.name: Kate Thornton, David Soul, Dane Bowers, Dave Gorman
episodes.overview: Actor and singer David Soul and television presenter Kate Thornton join the regulars Mark Lamarr, Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus for the irreverent light-hearted pop quiz.

episodes.name: Never Mind The Buzzcocks Special
episodes.overview: Mark Lamarr , Sean Hughes and Phill Jupitus are joined by Dave Hill from Slade, Tony Wright of Terrorvision, GMTV's Lorraine Kelly and comedian Rich Hall for a fun and festive edition of the irreverent pop quiz.

episodes.name: Comic Relief Presents: Have I Got Buzzcocks All Over
episodes.overview: Angus Deayton, Nick Hancock, Sean Hughes, Stephen Fry, David Gower, Phill Jupitus and Moloko's Roison Murphy get together for a special comic combination of quiz styles.

episodes.name: Jo Breezer, Alesha Dixon, Rich Hall, Richard McNamara

episodes.name: Phil Alexander, Kiki Dee, Richard Fairbrass, Mike Wilmot
episodes.overview: Host Mark Lamarr and captains Phill Jupitus and Sean Hughes are joined by singer Kiki Dee, Kerrang!'s Phil Alexander, comedian Mike Wilmot and Right Said Fred's Richard Fairbrass. Last in the present series.

episodes.name: Never Mind the Buzzcocks Christmas Special
episodes.overview: Mark Lamarr hosts a festive edition of the irreverent music quiz, where team captains Phill Jupitus and Sean Hughes are joined by Hearsay's Myleene Klass, pop siren Belinda Carlisle, Scottish singer Fish and comedian Johnny Vegas.

episodes.name: Never Mind the Buzzcocks: Technically, the Best Series Ever
episodes.overview: A look back at what were technically some excellent moments from series 22. Featuring a galaxy of technically good celebrity bookings and many, many technically funny sentences.

episodes.name: Russell Brand, Rachel Stevens, Sway, Greg Davies, Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall
episodes.overview:
The anarchic, award-winning pop quiz with host Simon Amstell, regular team captain Phill Jupitus, and special guest team captain Russell Brand. Guests include Rachel Stevens, Sway and Hugh Fearnley-Whittingstall.

(Unaired episode during series 22 initial run)

episodes.name: James Corden, Paloma Faith, Tom Clarke, Ben Miller, Janeane Garofalo
episodes.overview: The anarchic, award-winning pop quiz returns with team captain Noel Fielding opposite regular Phill Jupitus and guest host James Corden. Guest panellists include Tom Clarke, Paloma Faith, Ben Miller and American comedienne Janeane Garofalo.

episodes.name: Rhod Gilbert, Greg Davies, Martin Kemp, Gabby Logan, Jeremy Reynolds
episodes.overview: Regular team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host Rhod Gilbert and panellists Greg Davies, Martin Kemp, Gabby Logan and Jeremy Reynolds.

episodes.name: Alex James, Peter Serafinowicz, Holly Walsh, Jessica Origliasso, Newton Faulkner
episodes.overview: Anarchic, award-winning pop quiz. Regular team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host Alex James from Blur and panellists Peter Serafinowicz, stand-up comic Holly Walsh and Jessica Origliasso from The Veronicas.

episodes.name: Jack Whitehall, Stephen Mangan, Rochelle Wiseman, Mr Hudson, Andrea McLean
episodes.overview: Anarchic, award-winning pop quiz. Regular team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host Jack Whitehall and panellists musician Mr Hudson, Rochelle Wiseman from The Saturdays, Loose Women's Andrea McLean and actor Stephen Mangan.

episodes.name: Frank Skinner, Calvin Harris, Jon Richardson, Fearne Cotton, Tinchy Stryder
episodes.overview: Regular team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host Frank Skinner plus dance superstar Calvin Harris, comedian Jon Richardson, presenter Fearne Cotton and UK hip hop star Tinchy Stryder.

episodes.name: Claudia Winkleman, Harry Shearer, Little Boots, Jamelia, Tom Basden
episodes.overview: Claudia Winkleman hosts the quiz with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding and guests Harry Shearer, Little Boots, Jamelia and Tom Basden.

episodes.name: Mark Watson, Tim Minchin, Donal MacIntyre, Daniel Merriweather, Shingai Shoniwa
episodes.overview: The show is hosted by Mark Watson, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding. Guests include comedian Tim Minchin, investigative journalist Donal MacIntyre, musician Daniel Merriweather and lead singer of The Noisettes, Shingai Shoniwa.

episodes.name: Martin Freeman, Martha Wainwright, Charlie Brooker, Simon Bird, Dappy
episodes.overview: The show is hosted by actor Martin Freeman, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding. Guests include singer/songwriter Martha Wainwright, Screenwipe's Charlie Brooker and star of The Inbetweeners, Simon Bird, and there's the triumphant return of Dappy from N-Dubz.

episodes.name: David Walliams, Andy Serkis, Gareth Malone, Basshunter, Josie Long
episodes.overview: Little Britain's David Walliams hosts, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding. Guests include Lord of the Rings star Andy Serkis, Gareth Malone from BBC Two's The Choir, Swedish pop star Basshunter and comedian Josie Long.

episodes.name: Dermot O'Leary, Michael Ball, David O'Doherty, Russell Tovey, Aston Merrygold
episodes.overview: Presiding over team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding is The X Factor's Dermot O'Leary. The guests are star of stage and screen Michael Ball, Irish comedian David O'Doherty, History Boys and Being Human star Russell Tovey and, from JLS, Aston Merrygold.

episodes.name: Frankie Boyle, Carol Vorderman, DJ Ironik, Jon McClure, Richard Herring
episodes.overview: Presiding over team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding is host Frankie Boyle, and guests include former Countdown co-host Carol Vorderman, British rap star DJ Ironik, Jon McClure of Reverend and the Makers, and comedian Richard Herring.

episodes.name: The Doctor Who Special
episodes.overview: David Tennant hosts a special Dr Who-themed show with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding. Guests include Dr Who stars Bernard Cribbins and Catherine Tate, plus platinum-selling jazz artist Jamie Cullum and Radio 1's Jo Whiley.

episodes.name: Where Are They Now ?
episodes.overview: Hilarious highlights and outtakes from the latest series, plus a chance to see how some of the guest hosts' lives were changed forever by presenting one of the nation's best-loved pop quizzes. Featuring Frankie Boyle, David Tennant, Alex James, Claudia Winkleman, James Corden, Mark Watson and many more.

episodes.name: Mark Ronson, Alesha Dixon, Mollie King, Paul Foot, Tinie Tempah
episodes.overview: The music based panel show returns for its 24th series. Musician and producer Mark Ronson hosts.

episodes.name: Catherine Tate, Tulisa Contostavlos, Howard Marks, Badly Drawn Boy, Katy Wix
episodes.overview: The anarchic, award-winning pop quiz returns with team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus. Guest presenter is Catherine Tate, with guests Howard Marks, Badly Drawn Boy, Katy Wix and Tulisa Contostavlos.

episodes.name: Jack Dee, Charlie Higson, Eliza Doolittle, Jedward, Katy Brand
episodes.overview: Guest presenter is comedian Jack Dee, with guests singer Eliza Doolittle, author Charlie Higson, comedian Katy Brand and X Factor twins Jedward.

episodes.name: Terry Wogan, Edith Bowman, Rufus Hound, James Blunt, Imelda May
episodes.overview: Anarchic pop quiz hosted by Terry Wogan with team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus. Guests are: Edith Bowman, Rufus Hound, James Blunt and Imelda May.

episodes.name: David O'Doherty, Mel B, Olly Murs, Peter Jones, Joe Wilkinson
episodes.overview: Anarchic pop quiz. Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest presenter David O'Doherty, and panellists Mel B, Olly Murs, Peter Jones and Joe Wilkinson.

episodes.name: Tim Minchin, Paloma Faith, Jason Donovan, Tim Key, DJ Target
episodes.overview: Anarchic, award-winning pop quiz. Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest presenter Tim Minchin, and panellists Paloma Faith, Jason Donovan, Tim Key and DJ Target.

episodes.name: Tim Westwood, JLS, Holly Walsh, Russell Watson, Wiley
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest presenter Tim Westwood and panellists JLS, Holly Walsh, Russell Watson and Wiley.

episodes.name: Lee Mack, Jon Richardson, Diana Vickers, Andrew Stone, Irwin Sparkes
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest presenter Lee Mack plus guest panellists Irwin Sparkes, Diana Vickers, Jon Richardson and Andrew Stone.

episodes.name: Juliette Lewis, Theo Hutchcraft, Nick Grimshaw, Kimberly Wyatt, Vic Reeves
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host Juliette Lewis plus guest panellists Theo Hutchcraft, Nick Grimshaw, Kimberly Wyatt and Vic Reeves.

episodes.name: Josh Groban, Charlie Baker, Tinchy Stryder, KT Tunstall, Michael Ball
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest presenter Josh Groban and panellists Charlie Baker, Tinchy Stryder, KT Tunstall and Michael Ball.

episodes.name: Robert Webb, Cee Lo Green, Chris Packham, Example, Andi Osho
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host Robert Webb plus guest panellists Cee Lo Green, Chris Packham, Example and Andi Osho.

episodes.name: Frankie Boyle, Miles Jupp, Goldie, Professor Green, Michelle Williams
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host Frankie Boyle plus guest panellists Michelle Williams, Goldie, Professor Green and Miles Jupp.

episodes.name: Best of Series 24
episodes.overview: Pop Quiz host David O'Doherty presents a compilation of the best bits from this series of Never Mind the Buzzcocks. Join him as he reunites all of the guest hosts for a star-studded evening of entertainment.

episodes.name: David Hasselhoff, Amelle Berrabah, Peter Serafinowicz, Louie Spence, Loick Essien
episodes.overview: In the first show of the new series, David Hasselhoff is the Guest Chairman, presiding over team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding, who are joined by Louie Spence, Sugababe Amelle, Loick Essien and Peter Serafinowicz.

episodes.name: Jack Dee, Spencer Matthews, Alex James, Maverick Sabre, Seann Walsh
episodes.overview: The second in the 25th anniversary series, with team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus. Host this week is Jack Dee and guests are Spencer Matthews, Alex James, Maverick Sabre and Seann Walsh.

episodes.name: Lorraine Kelly, Jarred Christmas, Professor Green, Stacey Solomon, Tony Law
episodes.overview: The third in the 25th series, with team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus. Hosting this week is Lorraine Kelly and guests are Jarred Christmas, Professor Green, Stacey Solomon and Tony Law.

episodes.name: Adam Buxton, Reggie Yates, Margaret Cho, Beverley Knight, Dynamo
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus and guest host Adam Buxton are joined by Radio 1 DJ Reggie Yates, American stand-up Margaret Cho, magician Dynamo, and soul singer Beverley Knight.

episodes.name: Will Young, Mark Watson, Sinitta, Paul Foot, DJ Toddla T
episodes.overview: Will Young will be in the host chair for this brand new episode of Never Mind The Buzzcocks along with captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus. They'll be joined by X Factor's Sinitta, comedians Mark Watson and Paul Foot as well as cool DJ Toddla T.

episodes.name: Greg Davies, Amy Childs, Frankie Boyle, Ian 'H' Watkins, Tinchy Stryder, Holly Walsh
episodes.overview: Anarchic music quiz. Greg Davies hosts, with captains Frankie Boyle and Noel Fielding plus The Only Way is Essex star Amy Childs, Tinchy Stryder, Ian 'H' Watkins and comedian Holly Walsh.

episodes.name: Alice Cooper, Rufus Hound, Wretch 32, Olly Murs, Penny Smith
episodes.overview: Guest host Alice Cooper is joined by guest panellists Olly Murs, Wretch 32, Rufus Hound and Penny Smith.

episodes.name: James Blunt, Harry Judd, Matthew Crosby, Sean Paul, Sarah Millican
episodes.overview: Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by guest host James Blunt and panellists Harry Judd from Strictly, Sarah Millican, Sean Paul and Matt Crosby.

episodes.name: Tinie Tempah, Pixie Lott, Example, Chris Ramsey, Joey Page
episodes.overview: Tinie Tempah guest hosts. Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by Pixie Lott, Example, Chris Ramsey and Joey Page.

episodes.name: Cilla Black, Holly Willoughby, Tiffany Stevenson, Rizzle Kicks, Angelos Epithemiou
episodes.overview: Cilla Black hosts with guests Holly Willoughby, Rizzle Kicks, Angelos Epithemiou (Renton Skinner) and Tiffany Stevenson.

episodes.name: Rhod Gilbert, Jimmy Osmond, Tom Parker, Caroline Flack, Charlie Baker
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding, and guests Jimmy Osmond, Tom Parker from The Wanted, Caroline Flack and Charlie Baker.

episodes.name: John Barrowman, Jason Derulo, Joe Wilkinson, Jason Manford, Helen Skelton
episodes.overview: Christmas Never Mind the Buzzcocks, with guest host John Barrowman alongside Jason Derulo, Joe Wilkinson, Jason Manford, Helen Skelton, Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding.

episodes.name: Series Highlights
episodes.overview: The best from the latest series, featuring Alice Cooper, Lorraine Kelly, James Blunt, Tinie Tempah, Cilla Black and more.

episodes.name: Kathy Burke, Fazer, Sarah Millican, Greg Rutherford, and Mark Hoppus
episodes.overview: In the first show of the series, team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding are joined by Olympian Greg Rutherford, N-Dubz's Fazer, comedienne Sarah Millican and Mark Hoppus of Blink-182 with guest host Kathy Burke.

episodes.name: Example, Gareth Malone, Wretch 32, Lianne La Havas, Rufus Hound
episodes.overview: Team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding are joined on the anarchic music quiz by choir master Gareth Malone and rapper Wretch 32, all under the watchful eye of guest host Example.

episodes.name: Jack Whitehall, Mena Suvari, Danny from McFly, Celia Pacquola, and Paul Foot
episodes.overview: Joining Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus on Buzzcocks is comedian Jack Whitehall, who takes over hosting duties. American Pie actress Mena Suvari and Danny from McFly also pop in for some pop quiz comedy capers.

episodes.name: Nick Grimshaw, Joe Lycett, Fred Macpherson, Conor Maynard, and Nancy Dell'Olio
episodes.overview: Having taken over hosting duties on the Radio One Breakfast Show, Nick Grimshaw does the same on the anarchic music quiz. Team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by singer Conor Maynard.

episodes.name: Lee Mack, Joe Wilkinson, Amy Macdonald, Lemar, Professor Green, and Chris Ramsey
episodes.overview: Comedian Lee Mack steps up to the comedy pop quiz plate for Buzzcocks hosting duties, and with Noel Fielding away, his team captains are Professor Green and Phill Jupitus.

episodes.name: Ne-Yo, Delilah, Aiden Grimshaw, Stacey Solomon, David O'Doherty
episodes.overview: R&B superstar Ne-Yo takes control of the show this week. Joining team captains Noel and Phill are Stacey Solomon, David O'Doherty, Aiden Grimshaw and Mercury Prize nominee Delilah.

episodes.name: Richard Ayoade, Ed Sheeran, Caroline Flack, Matthew Crosby, and Shingai Shoniwa
episodes.overview: The IT Crowd star Richard Ayoade hosts the pop quiz. Ed Sheeran, Caroline Flack, Matthew Crosby and Noisettes singer Shingai Shoniwa also join the team for some pop-quiz antics.

episodes.name: Richard Madeley, Heidi Range, Maverick Sabre, Seann Walsh
episodes.overview: Richard Madeley joins team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus as the guest host. On the panel are Sugababe Heidi Range, Maverick Sabre, and comedian Seann Walsh.

episodes.name: Alex Horne, Louis Smith, Paloma Faith, Josh Widdicombe, and Tony Law
episodes.overview: Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by host, musical comedian Alex Horne and his band. Olympian and Strictly star Louis Smith and Paloma Faith also join in the comedy pop quiz capers alongside comedians Josh Widdicombe and Tony Law.

episodes.name: Stephen Mangan, Kayvan Novak, Michelle Heaton
episodes.overview: Actor Stephen Mangan takes over hosting duties this week. Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by Kayvan Novak and Michelle Heaton.

episodes.name: Liza Tarbuck, Rita Ora, Labrinth, Jameela Jamil, and Jason Manford
episodes.overview: Liza Tarbuck hosts this edition. Joining Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus on the teams are pop superstars Rita Ora and Labrinth, Jameela Jamil and comedian Jason Manford.

episodes.name: Touching People
episodes.overview: Buzzcocks takes a look back at some of the highlights of the series where Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus have been joined by hosts including Lee Mack, Kathy Burke, Richard Ayoade, Nick Grimshaw, Ne-Yo, Example and Jack Whitehall.

episodes.name: Christmas Special - Bob Mortimer, Mel C, DJ Fresh, Russell Tovey, Joey Page
episodes.overview: Bob Mortimer hosts this Christmassy edition. Joining Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus on the teams are Spice Girl Melanie C, DJ Fresh, actor Russell Tovey, and comedian Joey Page.

episodes.name: John Hannah, Basement Jaxx, AlunaGeorge, James Acaster
episodes.overview: The comedy music quiz returns, with a guest host taking charge of proceedings. Regular team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding are joined on the first show by electronic duos Basement Jaxx and AlunaGeorge, and comedian James Acaster.

episodes.name: Russell Howard, Conor Maynard, Lethal Bizzle, Isy Suttie
episodes.overview: Russell Howard takes on Buzzcocks hosting duties, and joining team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding on the panel are Conor Maynard and Lethal Bizzle.

episodes.name: Peter Andre, Jason Gardiner, Ana Matronic, Charles Cave and Tony Law
episodes.overview: Guest Host Peter Andre. Jason Gardiner and Ana Matronic (Scissor Sisters) on Phill's Team, Charles Cave (White Lies) and Tony Law on Noel's team.

episodes.name: Sara Cox, Iggy Azalea, Matt Richardson, Jake Humphrey and Eliza Doolittle
episodes.overview: Guest Host Sara Cox. Iggy Azalea and Matt Richardson on Phill's team. Jake Humphrey and Eliza Doolittle on Noel's team.

episodes.name: Kristin Schaal, Rylan Clark, Daniel O'Docherty, James Arthur, Alice Levine
episodes.overview: Kristen Schaal takes over the hosting duties for this episode of the pop music panel show.

episodes.name: Eamonn Holmes, Sarah Millican, Jaymi Hensley, Shaun Ryder, Greg McHugh
Rizzle Kicks, Huey Morgan, Lissie, Laura Whitmore and Paul Foot
Michael Bolton, Carol Vorderman, Diana Vickers, Shane Filan and Seann Walsh
Jack Whitehall, Kriss Akabusi, Johnny Borrell, Katy B, Alex Brooker
Warwick Davis, Tom Fletcher, Emma Willis, Alfie Boe, Chris Ramsey
Dizzee Rascal, Jamie Cullum, Aston Merrygold, Foxes, Katherine Ryan
The Hunt For The Missing Episode
episodes.overview: Krishnan Guru-Murthy takes a look back at the best bits of this series of Never Mind The Buzzcocks whilst investigating the ludicrous claim that there was a missing episode of the pop quiz, and whether Phill and Noel are part of the cover up. Guest hosts include Dizzee Rascal, Warwick Davis, Jack Whitehall, Russell Howard, Peter Andre, Kristen Schaal, Michael Bolton and Rizzle Kicks.

episodes.name: Johnny Vegas, Brian McFadden, DJ Locksmith, Sara Pascoe and Jessica Hynes
Professor Green, Roisin Conaty, Matt Healy, Gabby Logan
episodes.overview: Guests on this first episode of the new series are rapper Professor Green, comic Roisin Conaty, the 1975's Matt Healy and TV presenter Gabby Logan.

episodes.name: Ella Eyre, Harrison Koisser, Stacey Solomon, Seann Walsh
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts another round of the light-hearted music quiz, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding joined by guests including chart-topping singer Ella Eyre, Harrison Koisser from Peace, Stacey Solomon and Seann Walsh.

episodes.name: Alex Brooker, Sara Pascoe, John Cooper Clarke, Amelia Lily
Kerry Godliman, James Acaster, Har Mar Superstar, Nicole Scherzinger
Adam Ant, Paul Foot, Sara Cox and Fuse ODG
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts another round of the light-hearted music quiz, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding joined by singer Adam Ant, comedian Paul Foot, radio DJ Sara Cox and rapper Fuse ODG.

episodes.name: Lisa Stansfield, Ana Matronic, Aisling Bea and Joe Lycett
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts another round of the light-hearted music quiz, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding joined by pop singer Lisa Stansfield, Ana Matronic of Scissor Sisters and stand-up comedians Aisling Bea and Joe Lycett.

episodes.name: Michael Ball, Lethal Bizzle, Gemma Cairney and Sarah Millican
episodes.overview: Michael Ball, Lethal Bizzle, Gemma Cairney and Sarah Millican

episodes.name: Katherine Ryan, Loyd Grossman, Charlie Simpson and Paloma Faith
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts another round of the light-hearted music quiz, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding joined by comedienne Katherine Ryan, TV presenter Loyd Grossman, Fightstar frontman Charlie Simpson and pop singer and actress Paloma Faith.

episodes.name: Grace Chatto, Rob Beckett, Charli XCX, Phil Daniels
episodes.overview: Host Rhod Gilbert and regular team captains Noel Fielding and Phill Jupitus are joined by Clean Bandit's Grace Chatto, comedian Rob Beckett, musician Charli XCX and actor Phil Daniels.

episodes.name: Rixton, Kym Marsh, Van McCann and Romesh Ranganathan
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts another round of the light-hearted music quiz, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding joined by Charley Bagnall and Jake Roche from pop band Rixton, Coronation Street star Kym Marsh, Catfish and the Bottlemen frontman Van McCann and comedian Romesh Ranganathan.

episodes.name: Yasmine Akram, Steve Aoki, Bobby Mair and Rumer
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts another round of the light-hearted music quiz, with team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding joined by Irish actress Yasmine Akram, American musician and producer Steve Aoki, Canadian stand-up comedian Bobby Mair and singer-songwriter Rumer.

episodes.name: Louis Walsh, Glen Matlock, Lloyd Langford and Melissa Steel
episodes.overview: Rhod Gilbert hosts this festive edition of the comedy quiz, with X Factor judge Louis Walsh, former Sex Pistols bassist Glen Matlock, comedian Lloyd Langford and singer Melissa Steel joining team captains Phill Jupitus and Noel Fielding for several rounds of music-related silliness with a Christmas twist.

episodes.name: The Series That Changed the World
episodes.overview: Hilarious highlights from series 28, the series that changed the world.
